body:
had another really good day at work

heard good career news for another (different) friend

it's been sunny and relatively warm

d gets to work from home more than usual

making an effort to do more yoga and trigger point stuff, which means my body's baseline soreness is lower than usual

reruns of the american version of _the office_ forever (said in _spring breakers_ voice)

gnocchi
